name: Army Convoy Air Combat Mission
description:
Army Convoy Air Combat Mission is action adventure air fight war games, with addictive destruction in action games world. Becoming a pilot of supersonic F16, F18 & MIG 29 aircraft is everyone's dream. Now you can fly it from Aircraft Carrier above stunning islands and Pacific Sea. Take off your combat fighter Jet from the Aircraft Carrier, do different successful dangerous furious combat missions with airplane, attack & destroy the different military convoy. Experience an awesome air battle flight simulator that puts your adrenaline pumping. Take flight and battle against enemy fighter jets to rise up the ranks and become the best pilot to save your country. You can play with awesome air fighter combat simulation and destroy all the enemy military convoys on your way to save your people from invasion. Try to fight all the copter, tanks, and airspeed fighters jets on your way. Just scroll and control your fighter jets, shooting and destroying the enemy attacking us. Avoid enemy Airplanes, Air Fighters convoy, Aircraft, Air Navy Fighters, gun strikes and obstacles and destroy them by your excellent gun strike shoots at them!

Army Convoy Air Combat Mission is an ultimate sky war against the enemy airplanes and sky fighters. Use all your skill as a pilot to take out both land and air targets to complete each mission. Take control of your air force fighter jet and fly high into the skies. Fight the air battle in the skies against some of the best airplanes. It is a flight simulator mission game to test your flying skills. Your airbase - Aircraft Carrier is under the enemy air force attack and the freedom of your airbase is in danger. Play the air strike battle simulation and defend your country’s pride in this jet fighter flight simulator. Show your sovereignty as a pro fighter jet pilot to battle the sky war. Destroy enemy navy, lethal weapons and carrier ships to combat against their air force strike. Become a project flight driver and fly high in this air force flight simulator. Defend your base against air and navy attacks. Complete the series of air missions and save your country’s pride. Get the taste of flying the deadliest war machines like F-16, F-18 & MIG 29. Fly high in the skies like a pro air force fighter jet pilot. Disengage your jet from enemy SAM missiles, avoid radars, select your favorite weapons and destroy warships, shoot Gunship aircraft. Get ready for an ultimate air attack!

Army Convoy Air Combat Mission features:
- Fly F16, F18 and MIG 29
- Challenging missions
- Realistic controls with smooth gesture movement
- 3rd person and cockpit controller view
- Intensified blend on flight simulation and air combat
- Very cool sound and screen effects in the aircraft attack
- Dozens Of modern weapons from the enemy, such as aircraft fighter, tank and aircraft carrier.
